description: Try our easy to follow Piquant Peppery Hummus recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Piquant Peppery Hummus Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Purée 225g drained canned chickpeas with 50ml lemon juice, 2 garlic cloves, salt and black pepper to taste, 30ml cold water, 3 mild piquant peppers,1 seeded red chilli, 3 tbsp tahini paste, and 30ml olive oil in a blender or food processor. Taste to check the seasoning. To serve, place 1 tsp of the hummus on top of each oatcake, garnish with sliced red chilli, toasted pine nuts, and coriander or parsley.
